title: Choice and constraint
description: Toy example that chooses a menu with exactly one main course and one drink.

% Choice & constraint example: choose exactly one main course and one drink

main(pasta; pizza; salad).
drink(water; wine).

1 { choose_main(M) : main(M) } 1.
1 { choose_drink(D) : drink(D) } 1.

:- choose_main(pizza), choose_drink(wine).

#show choose_main/1.
#show choose_drink/1.
